home.name: Home
home.title: Home
home.heading: What is Skizophonic?
home.block1: The slowest band in history was formed in Spain between Benicassim and Castellón in late 2003, playing a style of alternative rock infused with elements of classic rock.
home.block2: However, in their restless pursuit of eclectic ideas, the band gradually shifted toward garage, soul, and especially acid sounds, blending in a mod spirit with subtle electronic touches.
home.block3: Today, they survive as soldiers of fortune. If you have good taste and a discerning ear, you might appreciate them.
